website_summaries.verdict: House of Marley's first true wireless earphones, the Liberate Air, deliver solid audio, but there are more compelling options in this price range.
cons: Pairing process is clumsy and outdated
Not for those seeking accurate audio performance
On-ear controls can be difficult to operate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase !
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are so easy to pair (unlike other ones I’ve bought before) Sound is great. I use them for Spotify and just went through all the EQ options and found the perfect settings for me . I also like the reset button being on the case rather than the buds...makes it much easier. The bamboo finish is cool too.
customer_reviews.author: ben miles

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. It comes very well packaged and you can definitely see the quality that has gone into these. Incredibly quick and easy to sync to your phone. The sound quality is excellent and they also have a great battery life. Most headphones aggravate my ears but these are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Living James

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bluetooth buds at good price
customer_reviews.text: Within a couple of minutes these buds were in my ear and working. My concern about how well they’d fit my ears was quickly overcome with a snug comfortable fit. Sound quality is good, bass adequate and no different to other premium buds I’ve tried. The case, charging and overall look of the buds is quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: True Wireless Quality from HOM
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing, I've always stuck with house of Marley for 6 or so years now from wired to wireless. As soon as a I saw these I just had to get them. If you like House of Marley products and are looking for some true wireless beasts, these are what you want!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel I.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could have dreamed
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Fairly comfortable in ears. I was expecting they would not fit because they look big and I have very small ears but if you follow the instructions about how to insert them, they are actually quite snug and so comfortable you forget you're wearing them. Battery life is amazing. Easy to pair and connect. As soon as you open the case they connect to your phone if your Bluetooth is on so when I am getting ready to leave the house, all I need to do is put them in my ears and press play on whatever I am listening to.
customer_reviews.author: Miss G A Braham

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: Now if I was you forget the instructions and watch the video on house of Marley site to pair and use them otherwise you could spend hours trying to pair .. as for the buds there not bad sound is good touch works ok and taking calls works and you can use them one at a time so all in all there not bad
customer_reviews.author: lee bedding

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Case didn’t charge but got a refund quickly and easily from amazon. Also didn’t stay in my ear well. Searched and searched for buds that have a clip to stay in but never found anything and Marley don’t make them. Would probably go for the more expensive ones so they stay in better
customer_reviews.author: mummabear

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality,comfortable to wear and good battery life..Love the case,very handy to carry.Ive had many compliments
customer_reviews.author: Ms. E. Katona

customer_reviews.title: Unexciting, problematic.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality but volume is on the lower end of tolerable, especially if you like bass, I expect compromises had to be made for battery life (which is great - I can get about six hours at max) Having issues with the earphones staying connected when they're meant to be charging and can take a couple of attempts to get both earphones to pair. Functional but I miss the 3.5mm aux. Oh forget the touch controls, they work about 20% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: X SIECLE

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Another great product from Marley. For me, the Marley earphones are the best on the market and these Bluetooth earphones don't disappoint. They are really comfortable and have a terrific sound quality. I recommend this product 100%
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. Coyne

customer_reviews.title: Really unhappy...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed these were a birthday gift and we can't get them to contact or only one of earbuds work... Lot if money not to worry... Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great looking headphones. Sound quality is better than expected. Battery life is excellent only down side is not a comfy fit after a long period of wear. Overall would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones perfect sound quality & fits comfortably in the ear. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Kyran T.

customer_reviews.title: they ok BUT...
customer_reviews.text: sound quality, baterry life ok and they stay inside my ear (not falling off) BUT left earphone stop working not even after 1 month i got the. it stop charging and stop connecting with phone so I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Simona

customer_reviews.title: Okay sound quality, but very bad fit.
customer_reviews.text: Headphones sound okay, nothing extraordinary to justify the price, the fits is absolute rubbish. They'd fall out of my ears very often, I never felt like they had a secure fit in my ears. A shame considering the company has so many positives like recycled materials and they plant a tree for every sale.
customer_reviews.author: Narcis

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: Bought and tried - very comfortable, good sound (nice mid and hi, not too tinny; bass is good when the buds are in snug), very good battery life. They have some weight and feel robust. The smart touch play/pause/skip/answer takes a little getting used to, but is smooth when you've got the hang of it. Aesthetically, they are beautiful, as is the charging case. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: O. Westerman

customer_reviews.title: Marley
customer_reviews.text: Within 5 minutes of opening package connected and controls understood. Good sound quality great packaging and very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: jenny gherasim

customer_reviews.title: love them but packed up after 6 moths
customer_reviews.text: One stopped working and one stopped charging after 6 moths ? Trying for an exchange
customer_reviews.author: Peter K. Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Blown away
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. They look really smart and in a nice presentation case.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Was going to get airbuds, then didnt
customer_reviews.text: Sound great, look great, feel great, smell okay I guess... I’m not going to taste them. Not beyond a sneaky desync though are we righty?
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Just what u need.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Super easy to pair. Good quality sound.. Very confortable buds and beautiful case. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Can OZER

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good head phones, definitely good value for the money, sound quality during music and phone calls in brilliant. The only issue I had was that the touch controls don’t always work very wel
customer_reviews.author: Rory Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Near Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality , both incoming and outgoing just wish they had more earbuds as just standard size included. Other than that can't fault them functional and stylish
customer_reviews.author: Jack Jones

customer_reviews.title: Shame about the design
customer_reviews.text: For the price e there are better ones out there , might be my ears but they are top heavy and don’t stay in your ears properly, the sound quality is good shame about the design
customer_reviews.author: d . matthews

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend to anyone with an busy/active lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: Earphones were inconsistent in sound quality, call function did not work at all, touch sensitive pads worked when ever they felt like it, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: may not work for long term
customer_reviews.text: Was good for abit but now only the left side works and the right side is refusing to contact to anything only had them just under 1 month
customer_reviews.author: Kieran

customer_reviews.title: Quality ear pods
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for a gift for someone went down well great quality and the price was the cheapest around
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Not only do they support AAC, but they also support aptX! How do you NOT describe this in the marketing specs?! USB-C, great battery life, hot looks. What's not to love! Sound is crisp, but not too sharp, mids sit nicely in the driver's seat, which means vocals are not recessed, and bass is fairly deep, round, and solid. No bass bloat or weak sauce bass, it's just nice and sweet. No noticeable driver flex. Dual mics also work well for calls. 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: hifi80sman

customer_reviews.title: They are ah-ight...
customer_reviews.text: These look awesome. After putting my custom ear tips even better. The sound pretty good. Mids are great. Here is my problem... The right bud has connectivity issues and the left sometimes turns off. This is definitely a software issue. I did try to pair it again. I paired the right bud first and then paired left bud right after. I have not had the issues that I have described previously. I would do an update but i just had to return these. For this price, that issue should not have occurred. Maybe newer models being produced will be fixed but for me yeah i can't have that connectivity issue off the bat. I get annoyed easily.
customer_reviews.author: KAM-Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Sexy earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, I bought them to match my house of Marley bluetooth speaker , which is amazing, and sounds awesome! But for $150, the sound is super weak!!! I bought the TOZO T10, that's waterproof and $120 cheaper, and they sound like you are in a car that has a bad @$$ sound system. So unless you are just buying these to support the trees the marley's plant. Save your money and buy the TOZO T10, YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ponnelli Morris

customer_reviews.title: TROUBLE WITH PAIRING
customer_reviews.text: THE LEARNING CURVE TO USE THESE IS SUPER STEEP. MANY TIMES THE DEVICE UNPAIRS WITHOUT ANY CAUSE. I COULD BE 3 FEET AWAY OR 3 INCHES AWAY AND THEY BECOME UNPAIRED. DURING THE PAIRING PROCESS IT ALSO DISAPPOINTS, IT SAYS THAT THERE WILL BE A PROMPT SAYING IF YOU WANT TO PAIR THE HEADSET SO YOU CAN LISTEN FROM BOTH EARS. THIS IS A LIE. BOTH ON MY PHONE AND LAPTOP THIS DIDNT WORK I COULD ONLY LISTEN FROM THE LEFT EARPIECE. I UPDATED ALL THE DRIVERS ON MY COMPUTER AND UPDATED MY PHONE IT REMAINED A PROBLEM. I AM UNDOUBTEDLY DISAPPOINTED WITH THE QUALITY OF THIS PRODUCT AND HOUSE OF MARLEY.
customer_reviews.author: Miryam Gil

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds were for my brother, he read the reviews and asked me to purchase them. And the product did not disappoint, he’s using them all the time and he’s really happy with the sound quality. I’m thinking about purchasing ones for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Cbravo85

customer_reviews.title: Bang for you buck.
customer_reviews.text: Slight lag on syncing to iPhone every time I used it. Other than that works great. Went with these because the rubber ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: James K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. When I listen to them, I cannot hear anything but the music and the music sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a lot of earbuds and I think this earbuds will be the one I will be keeping, I love how the sound on these small earbuds are and the very neat and sophisticated design on it is amazing the most comfortable when placed properly in the ears
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel L.

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product with one huge flaw. Constantly drops signal and Bluetooth repairing is an actual nightmare. (Won’t pair at all, only one bud will pair at times)
customer_reviews.author: chris70794

customer_reviews.title: Poor connection
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good. However, my right ear bud could not connect to my phone three months after I purchase this item. I don't think they produce high quality products.
customer_reviews.author: HSUAN

customer_reviews.title: smooth
customer_reviews.text: best 150 that I spent in my life but microphone ain't good with phone calls. idk how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Enrod

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: The product came with no usb charging cable and extra ear tips
customer_reviews.author: Angel Quiroz

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky, controls don’t function well.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of Marley products and the sound quality is good but unfortunately these are just a bit too bulky, they are constantly falling out or feel out of place in your ear. The controls on the ears are impossible to use, very hard to pause, skip songs ect it just jumps to Siri then stops music altogether. I’m a bit annoyed I spent so much money on them
customer_reviews.author: Richard. E.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the case and the bamboo insert look, Pairing is very easy , the sound is super quality and the playtime is great, however I do not like how far they protrude from the ear , I suppose it depends on the size of your ear I’ve attached photos of them in my teenage sons ear and mine and they do not sit very flush on either of our ears. If I was spending this much money I would buy apple AirPods, the quality is the same but I find the fit of the AirPods much better in our smaller ears.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My new favourite headphone
customer_reviews.text: If nothing but sound was being rated these are a flat out easy 5 out of 5. the sound is truly amazing and could match any higher end earphones, But items are rated on looks and build quality also. That isnt an issue here, these are build really well mad of bamboo, aluminium, natural wood fibre composite and rewind fabric composed of 100% Recycled PET Then we move on to looks and in my option there look amazing, real time and effort has gone in to making these look amazing. The case is well made also and had a top premium feel to it. I have a new set of favourite headphone and its these.
customer_reviews.author: Adam James Winch

customer_reviews.title: WOW AMAZING !!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow ear buds are amazing, they cancelled out all the background noise, I was in my living-room & didn’t hear any background noise, I went outside didn’t hear any background noise, the feel of them is really good as they seem to have some sort of grip outside the wooden ( bamboo ) area, very easy to pair to my phone, the quality of the music / sound is outstanding, the range is extremely good, I went just over 11 meters and was still able to have my music on, extremely highly recommend these ear buds they really are amazing ps if I could give it more than 5 stars I certainly would!
customer_reviews.author: Karen McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but entirely reliant on the shape of your ears
customer_reviews.text: Love them to death but they're so dependant on the individual shape of the ear for fit. They're great for the gym and running, complete block out all noise and distraction. Great sound quality, good batter life and no loss of Bluetooth connectivity. They are perfect for me but you might hate them because they don't fit you.
customer_reviews.author: Yusuf (Smiley) Yearwood

customer_reviews.title: The benefits of AirPods, only much, much cooler!
customer_reviews.text: These are simply stunning wireless earphones - not only do they look great, operate perfectly and have a brilliant design, they are made from sustainable materials. Very cool in many ways. They pair via bluetooth - I haven't had a single problem with this. They hold up to 9 hours charge - charge via the case, as with AirPods. They look so much better than AirPods though and fit much better and more comfortably too. I highly recommend these earphones ... easily the coolest on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Youdontownme

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deffo buy best ever
customer_reviews.text: I received these today for Christmas . These are the best ear phones I have ever had . Being hard of hearing makes me need my music at full volume there is little sound leakage and I can have 1 paired at a time they pair so easy and charge so easy this is a very well through about product that I would recommend . Amazing these ar going to become my best friend I can tell .
customer_reviews.author: BamBam

customer_reviews.title: Jangly
customer_reviews.text: I was not concerned about the eco credentials of this item. I haven’t used earbuds before. I found the sound quality heavily trebly and jangly, even on pop. I’m still having trouble getting them to stay in my ear. It might be my error or they might be unbalanced.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Dragonflies

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Bluetooth Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are cool. They fit nicely in the ear and don't give any discomfort. And most importantly they deliver really good sound. I wear these earbuds most days now on my one hour train journey and I am really loving them. And they look cool.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C. Colbert

customer_reviews.title: A huge waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My son was interested in these because he liked that they were made of sustainable materials. Within a month or two either one or the other bud didn't work at any given time. We sent them back for a replacement pair, same issue. All the company will do is send us replacements until the warranty is up. Amazon won't refund the money since it's been more than a month since we bought them (they actually worked that first month). I'm going to buy my son the $30 pair I got myself that are still working fine two years later.
customer_reviews.author: Cynmill

customer_reviews.title: Sound great, but bad at staying connected.
customer_reviews.text: The sound they put out is great. My only problems are getting them to initially connect out of the case. The other problem is they disconnect alot after they connect. It seems like you have to put it back in the case to get it to reconnect. For me its a pain because i dont carry the case close around me. The problems didnt start right away. So i didnt ask for a replacement. I have had them since April and it took a couple months for the problems to start.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money folks
customer_reviews.text: My opinion... Horrible customer service, bad Bluetooth connection, they don’t stay in ear with sweat and way to expensive for the first 3 things I said.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L.

product_meta.title: Liberate Air True Wireless Earbuds | 32 Hour Charge Capacity, Sweat Resistant, 9 Hour Playtime | House of Marley
product_meta.description: Disconnect from wires and distractions and get lost in the music with Liberate Air- truly wireless earbuds made from truly sustainable materials such as FSC certified bamboo, recycled silicone and fabric. A Category First for House of Marley, Liberate Air earbuds have a 9-hour on-board battery life, with an additional 32 hours of charging in their case. Designed for active Lifestyles with water and sweat-proof materials, Liberate Air is the perfect companion on a hike or long bike ride by the beach. They also feature sensor-activated touch control technology for easy use during activity and USB-C charging to serve as a backup battery for your device. Liberate your sound.
feature_bullets: 9 HOUR ON BOARD BATTERY LIFE: The Liberate Air features 9 hours of battery life as well as a charging case with an additional 2.5 charges totaling for 32 hours. Listen longer and recharge less often
ACTIVE LIFESTYLE DESIGN: Designed for active lives and rugged environments, these earbuds are also sweat-proof & weather resistant to an IPX4 rating
G-SENSOR EAR HOUSING TOUCH CONTROL: Activate G-Sensor Ear Housing Touch Control to easily play, pause, or change music, take calls and more
STEREO: Stereo voice communications allow you to hear and be heard just as clearly as if the phone were to your ear
CONVENIENT USB-C CHARGING: This technology allows you to use any USB-C charger or accessory in tandem with your Liberate Air earbuds and their charging case

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars272 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
